goals.active: The Floating Grizwhirls are made by Uzolan.
goals.complete: I made my way to Uzolan's workshop. Unfortunately, the Ringmaster's hypnotized carnies arrived before I did. I defeated them and rescued Uzolan. The inventor told me that the Ringmaster is planning to use his grizwhirls to brainwash the masses at the next big performance in Divinity's Reach.
